Dragonfly::

"well" said the male "I just have to go to armoury to get somethings 
and we go to the fight... Do you wait me here or do you follow me to 
armoury?"


--- In nbwrpg@y..., Yanshosh@a... wrote:
> ::Crater::
> 
> Crater's eyes light up at the sound of fighting. Even though he was 
> less than a day old, he knew how to use many weapons, and loved to 
> fight. He would enjoy a chance to test his skills against these 
bots.
> 
> "Lets go fight!"
> 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Dragonfly.
> > 
> > Dragonfly saw Blacknightmare and Orchestra left the room. "Well" 
> said 
> > the male to Crater"What do you rather? stay in base and rest or 
> have 
> > agood fight?"
